short_description: Web application outage on production server
description: The main customer portal is down. Users report 503 errors when trying to access the application. Initial investigation shows the web server is running but not responding to HTTP requests.
Applications are experiencing intermittent database connection failures. Error logs show timeout exceptions when connecting to the primary database cluster.
The SSL certificate for the payment processing gateway has expired, causing secure transactions to fail. Users are receiving security warnings in their browsers.
resolution_notes: Renewed SSL certificate and deployed to the affected servers. Verified secure connections are working properly.
